product_name: DeFeet Woolie Boolie The Dude Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: Do you still think of wool as itchy? Think again. Woolie Boolie The Dude Bike Socks from DeFeet pamper your feet in a soft merino-wool blend that always feels good. Soft, moisture-wicking merino wool breathes well and keeps feet comfortable in a wide range of temperatures, and it resists odors so you don't have to worry about funky shoes. Nylon is added for durability and spandex and elastane for comfortable stretch.
short_description: Do you still think of wool as itchy? Think again. Woolie Boolie The Dude Bike Socks from DeFeet pamper your feet in a soft merino-wool blend that always feels good.
